article_node.title: China Makes Veiled Jab at US Before Hosting Modi, Putin, Erdogan
article_node.summary: China has accused the US of threatening world peace ahead of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) summit, which will host over 20 foreign leaders, including Vladimir Putin and Narendra Modi, in Tianjin from August 31 to September 1. The event marks a significant diplomatic gathering for China as it prepares to assume the rotating presidency of the SCO, emphasizing cooperation among member states on various issues, including security and economic integration.
